attack."},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"真後ろに跳んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"You jumped straight backward."},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"が、しかし――","translatedEnglishLine":"But, however—"},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"「駄目です！　＜エール＞さん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No good! <Aile>-san!\""},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの行動は魔王と比すればあまりに遅い。","translatedEnglishLine":"Your actions are far too slow compared to the Demon forward,"},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"到底避けきれない速度で剣を振り下ろしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and was bringing down his sword at a speed you simply couldn’t attack."},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"日光を掲げて待った。","translatedEnglishLine":"You lifted the sunlight and waited."},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"が、しかし――","translatedEnglishLine":"But, however—"},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"「駄目です！　＜エール＞さん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No good! it,"},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"日光が弾かれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the sunlight was repelled."},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王の攻撃を受け止めるなど、","translatedEnglishLine":"Blocking the Demon King’s attack—"},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"最初から出来はしなかったのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"was something you could never have done from the start."},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは攻撃を弾き返す為、","translatedEnglishLine":"In order to repel the strength."},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"が、しかし――","translatedEnglishLine":"But, however—"},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"「駄目です！　＜エール＞さん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No good! <Aile>-san!\""},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの渾身の力など、","translatedEnglishLine":"Your wholehearted strength was,"},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王の前にはないも同然だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"in front of the Demon King, as if it didn’t exist."},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"刀の攻撃はあっさりと押し負ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"Your sword attack was easily overpowered."},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"弾き返しきれなかった剣の軌跡は曲がり、","translatedEnglishLine":"The arc of your sword, failing to fully deflect, bent,"},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの身を襲う。","translatedEnglishLine":"and struck your body."},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"赤い鮮血が舞い、","translatedEnglishLine":"Bright red blood flew,"},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"視界が明滅するような激しい痛みが右肩に迸る。","translatedEnglishLine":"and intense pain flashed in your right shoulder, making your vision flicker."},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"右肩を深く抉られたが、なんとか命は繋いでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Your right shoulder was deeply gouged, but somehow you still clung to life."},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間のくせに存外粘る。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For a human, you’re surprisingly resilient."},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"　右腕一本で済むとは」","translatedEnglishLine":"To think I’m only taking out your right arm.\""},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、こう来たらどうする」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, what will you do if I come like this?\""},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"右側からの横薙ぎの一閃。","translatedEnglishLine":"A horizontal slash from the right side."},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"右腕が動かないあなたには、","translatedEnglishLine":"With your right arm unable to move,"},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"これを受ける術はない。","translatedEnglishLine":"you have no way to defend against this."},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは……","translatedEnglishLine":"You..."},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは体を折り曲げて、","translatedEnglishLine":"You bent your body,"},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"その場に伏せて攻撃を避けようとした。","translatedEnglishLine":"and tried to avoid the attack by lying down on the spot."},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは足に力を込め、","translatedEnglishLine":"You gathered strength into your legs,"},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"真後ろに跳ぼうとした。","translatedEnglishLine":"and attempted to jump straight backward."},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは意表を突く意味でも、","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, to surprise the opponent,"},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"いっそ間合いを思い切り狭める為、","translatedEnglishLine":"and to drastically close the distance,"},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"足を力を込めて前に跳ぼうとした。","translatedEnglishLine":"you braced your legs and tried to leap forward."},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いや」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No.\""},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、攻撃は来なかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, the attack did not come."},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やはり、こうするか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I knew it, you’ll do this.\""},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"意外にも魔王の取った行動は、蹴り。","translatedEnglishLine":"Surprisingly, the Demon King’s action was a kick."},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"一度行動に移したあなたには、","translatedEnglishLine":"Once you committed to your move,"},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに対応する暇などない。","translatedEnglishLine":"you have no time to react to it."},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"胸に魔王の爪先が突き刺さる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Demon King’s toe stabbed into your chest."},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"胸に鋭い痛みが走ったと思った瞬間――","translatedEnglishLine":"The moment you felt a sharp pain in your chest—"},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは天地も分からなくなるほどに転がされた。","translatedEnglishLine":"you were tossed around so violently you lost all sense of up and down."},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"気づけば地面に寝転がり、","translatedEnglishLine":"When you came to, you were lying on the ground,"},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは天井を仰いでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"staring up at the ceiling."},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"床にしたたかに頭を打ち付けたせいか、","translatedEnglishLine":"Perhaps because you struck your head hard on the floor,"},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"視界は朦朧としていたが、なんとか立ち上がる。","translatedEnglishLine":"your vision was hazy, but you managed to stand up."},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうやら骨が何本か折れたらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems some of your bones were broken."},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"息を吸っただけで走る激痛に、","translatedEnglishLine":"The sharp pain surged just from inhaling,"},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは体をくの字に折った。","translatedEnglishLine":"and you bent your body in a curve."},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたにも分かっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"You understood as well."},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王は遊んでいるだけだ、と。","translatedEnglishLine":"That the Demon King was merely toying with you."},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"後もう少し、ほんの少し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Just a little more, just a tiny bit,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは攻撃を避ける為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You jumped straight backward to avoid the attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真後ろに跳んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You jumped straight backward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、しかし――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, however—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目です！　＜エール＞さん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No good! <Aile>-san!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの行動は魔王と比すればあまりに遅い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your actions are far too slow compared to the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王は既に一歩踏み込み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King had already taken a step forward,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 到底避けきれない速度で剣を振り下ろしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was bringing down his sword at a speed you simply couldn’t dodge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは攻撃を受け止める為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You raised the sunlight to block the attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光を掲げて待った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You lifted the sunlight and waited.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、しかし――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, however—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目です！　＜エール＞さん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No good! <Aile>-san!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃を受けた瞬間、流すことすら出来ずに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment the attack hit, you couldn’t even deflect it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光が弾かれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the sunlight was repelled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の攻撃を受け止めるなど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Blocking the Demon King’s attack—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初から出来はしなかったのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was something you could never have done from the start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは攻撃を弾き返す為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In order to repel the attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 渾身の力を込めて剣を振り上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you raised your sword with all your strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、しかし――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, however—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目です！　＜エール＞さん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No good! <Aile>-san!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの渾身の力など、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your wholehearted strength was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の前にはないも同然だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in front of the Demon King, as if it didn’t exist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刀の攻撃はあっさりと押し負ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your sword attack was easily overpowered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弾き返しきれなかった剣の軌跡は曲がり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The arc of your sword, failing to fully deflect, bent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの身を襲う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and struck your body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤い鮮血が舞い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bright red blood flew,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視界が明滅するような激しい痛みが右肩に迸る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and intense pain flashed in your right shoulder, making your vision flicker.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 右肩を深く抉られたが、なんとか命は繋いでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your right shoulder was deeply gouged, but somehow you still clung to life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間のくせに存外粘る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For a human, you’re surprisingly resilient.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 右腕一本で済むとは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To think I’m only taking out your right arm."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、こう来たらどうする」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, what will you do if I come like this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 右側からの横薙ぎの一閃。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A horizontal slash from the right side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 右腕が動かないあなたには、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With your right arm unable to move,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これを受ける術はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you have no way to defend against this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは体を折り曲げて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You bent your body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場に伏せて攻撃を避けようとした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and tried to avoid the attack by lying down on the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは足に力を込め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You gathered strength into your legs,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真後ろに跳ぼうとした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and attempted to jump straight backward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは意表を突く意味でも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, to surprise the opponent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いっそ間合いを思い切り狭める為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and to drastically close the distance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足を力を込めて前に跳ぼうとした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you braced your legs and tried to leap forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、攻撃は来なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the attack did not come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やはり、こうするか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I knew it, you’ll do this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外にも魔王の取った行動は、蹴り。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surprisingly, the Demon King’s action was a kick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一度行動に移したあなたには、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once you committed to your move,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに対応する暇などない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you have no time to react to it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 胸に魔王の爪先が突き刺さる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King’s toe stabbed into your chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 胸に鋭い痛みが走ったと思った瞬間――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment you felt a sharp pain in your chest—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは天地も分からなくなるほどに転がされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you were tossed around so violently you lost all sense of up and down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気づけば地面に寝転がり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When you came to, you were lying on the ground,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは天井を仰いでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: staring up at the ceiling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 床にしたたかに頭を打ち付けたせいか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps because you struck your head hard on the floor,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視界は朦朧としていたが、なんとか立ち上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: your vision was hazy, but you managed to stand up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら骨が何本か折れたらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems some of your bones were broken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 息を吸っただけで走る激痛に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sharp pain surged just from inhaling,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは体をくの字に折った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and you bent your body in a curve.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたにも分かっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You understood as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王は遊んでいるだけだ、と。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That the Demon King was merely toying with you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後もう少し、ほんの少し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a little more, just a tiny bit,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは攻撃を避ける為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You jumped straight backward to avoid the attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真後ろに跳んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You jumped straight backward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、しかし――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, however—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目です！　＜エール＞さん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No good! <Aile>-san!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの行動は魔王と比すればあまりに遅い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your actions are far too slow compared to the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王は既に一歩踏み込み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King had already taken a step forward,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 到底避けきれない速度で剣を振り下ろしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was bringing down his sword at a speed you simply couldn’t dodge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは攻撃を受け止める為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You raised the sunlight to block the attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光を掲げて待った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You lifted the sunlight and waited.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、しかし――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, however—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目です！　＜エール＞さん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No good! <Aile>-san!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃を受けた瞬間、流すことすら出来ずに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment the attack hit, you couldn’t even deflect it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光が弾かれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the sunlight was repelled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の攻撃を受け止めるなど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Blocking the Demon King’s attack—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初から出来はしなかったのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was something you could never have done from the start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは攻撃を弾き返す為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In order to repel the attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 渾身の力を込めて剣を振り上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you raised your sword with all your strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、しかし――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, however—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目です！　＜エール＞さん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No good! <Aile>-san!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの渾身の力など、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your wholehearted strength was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の前にはないも同然だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in front of the Demon King, as if it didn’t exist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刀の攻撃はあっさりと押し負ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your sword attack was easily overpowered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弾き返しきれなかった剣の軌跡は曲がり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The arc of your sword, failing to fully deflect, bent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの身を襲う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and struck your body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤い鮮血が舞い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bright red blood flew,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視界が明滅するような激しい痛みが右肩に迸る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and intense pain flashed in your right shoulder, making your vision flicker.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 右肩を深く抉られたが、なんとか命は繋いでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your right shoulder was deeply gouged, but somehow you still clung to life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間のくせに存外粘る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For a human, you’re surprisingly resilient.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 右腕一本で済むとは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To think I’m only taking out your right arm."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、こう来たらどうする」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, what will you do if I come like this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 右側からの横薙ぎの一閃。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A horizontal slash from the right side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 右腕が動かないあなたには、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With your right arm unable to move,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これを受ける術はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you have no way to defend against this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは体を折り曲げて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You bent your body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場に伏せて攻撃を避けようとした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and tried to avoid the attack by lying down on the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは足に力を込め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You gathered strength into your legs,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真後ろに跳ぼうとした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and attempted to jump straight backward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは意表を突く意味でも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, to surprise the opponent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いっそ間合いを思い切り狭める為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and to drastically close the distance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足を力を込めて前に跳ぼうとした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you braced your legs and tried to leap forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、攻撃は来なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the attack did not come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やはり、こうするか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I knew it, you’ll do this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外にも魔王の取った行動は、蹴り。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surprisingly, the Demon King’s action was a kick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一度行動に移したあなたには、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once you committed to your move,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに対応する暇などない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you have no time to react to it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 胸に魔王の爪先が突き刺さる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King’s toe stabbed into your chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 胸に鋭い痛みが走ったと思った瞬間――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment you felt a sharp pain in your chest—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは天地も分からなくなるほどに転がされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you were tossed around so violently you lost all sense of up and down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気づけば地面に寝転がり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When you came to, you were lying on the ground,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは天井を仰いでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: staring up at the ceiling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 床にしたたかに頭を打ち付けたせいか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps because you struck your head hard on the floor,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視界は朦朧としていたが、なんとか立ち上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: your vision was hazy, but you managed to stand up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら骨が何本か折れたらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems some of your bones were broken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 息を吸っただけで走る激痛に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sharp pain surged just from inhaling,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは体をくの字に折った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and you bent your body in a curve.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたにも分かっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You understood as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王は遊んでいるだけだ、と。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That the Demon King was merely toying with you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後もう少し、ほんの少し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a little more, just a tiny bit,
